com.bnd.core.util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bnd.core.util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends Object
    ConversionUtil is a utility class for reading and writing a file.
    Since:
    2006
    Author:
    Â© Peter Banda

        public boolean checkDirectory(String destinationFileName)

        Parameters:
